main event: On August 13, 1960, at approximately 11:15 PM, two civilians observed a yellowish object oscillating in the sky while they were watching for a satellite. The object moved rapidly and silently.
interesting points: The object was described as pulsating and moving at a high rate of speed in a level flight path., The color of the object was yellowish., The observers noted that the object made no sound during the sighting., The object gradually became smaller before disappearing., The witnesses were familiar with aircraft and noted that this was definitely something unusual.
sighted object: a yellowish, pulsating unidentified flying object
